text: "Waiting on a Friend" is a 1981 song by English rock band The Rolling Stones and is the second single from the 1981 album Tattoo You. It went to number 13 in the United States, number 10 in Canada, number 15 in the Netherlands and number 17 in Belgium. Category:1981 songs Category:The Rolling Stones songs Category:Pop rock songs
title: Waiting on a Friend
